Package org.jtrim2.swing.component

Interface TransformationListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
TransformationAdapter
public interface TransformationListener
The interface to listen for changes in the transformation applied to an image. This interface was designed to use by the BasicTransformationModel.

Thread safety

Instances of this listener interface can only be notified from the AWT Event Dispatch Thread and therefore does not need to be thread-safe.

Synchronization transparency

Implementations of this interface does not need to be synchronization transparent but they must be aware that they are called from the AWT Event Dispatch Thread.
See Also:
  • BasicTransformationModel

    enterZoomToFitMode(Set<ZoomToFitOption> options)

  • Method Details

    • zoomChanged

      void zoomChanged()
      Invoked when the scaling property of the image has changed. When using BasicTransformationModel, this means that either the ZoomX or the ZoomY property has changed (or both).

      This method is called only after the change took place.

    • offsetChanged

      void offsetChanged()
      Invoked when the offset used to display image has changed. When using BasicTransformationModel, this means that either the OffsetX or the OffsetY property has changed (or both).

      This method is called only after the change took place.

    • flipChanged

      void flipChanged()
      Invoked when the image has been flipped vertically or horizontally. When using BasicTransformationModel, this means that either the FlipHorizontal or the FlipVertical property has changed (or both).

      This method is called only after the change took place.

    • rotateChanged

      void rotateChanged()
      Invoked when the image has been rotated. When using BasicTransformationModel, this means that either the RotateInDegrees or the RotateInRadians property has changed (or both).

      This method is called only after the change took place.

    • enterZoomToFitMode

      void enterZoomToFitMode(Set<ZoomToFitOption> options)
      Invoked when the image should be drawn to fit the display. When using BasicTransformationModel, this means that one of the setZoomToFit methods has been called and does change the ZoomToFit property.

      This method is called only after the change took place.

      Parameters:
      options - the zoom to fit rules needed to display the image. This argument cannot be null. This argument is the rules to which the ZoomToFit property was set but note that listeners previously called might have already adjusted the ZoomToFit property. If this is the case, the listener will be notified in another enterZoomToFitMode method call.

    • leaveZoomToFitMode

      void leaveZoomToFitMode()
      Invoked when the image no longer need to be drawn to fit the display. When using BasicTransformationModel, this means that the BasicTransformationModel.clearZoomToFit() method has been called and it needed to actually clear the ZoomToFit property.
